<html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Log Alayzer Chart</title>
<!-- CSS --> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/bootstrap.min.css" type="text/css"/> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css" type="text/css"/>

</head> <body style="margin-bottom: 0px;"> <div id="table"/> <div id="chart"/> <script src="js/main.js"></script> </body> </html>
